title: Elon Musk's Grok Under Fire After Complaints It Undressed Minors In Photos
description: Elon Musk's Grok on Friday said it was scrambling to fix flaws in the artificial intelligence tool after users claimed it turned pictures of children or women into erotic images.
content:
Elon Musk's Grok on Friday said it was scrambling to fix flaws in the artificial intelligence tool after users claimed it turned pictures of children or women into erotic images.

title: If India data centre investments were landmark in 2025, look out for new players, peaks in 2026
description: Following a record-breaking 2025, India’s data centre industry is bracing for a 20% jump in investments in 2026, driven by an insatiable demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content: Dear reader, as 2025, a year of global tumult and volatility, rolls by, Mint's reporters and columnists look around the corner on what is coming in 2026—to help you know what to expect and prepare for it. Tell us what you think at feedback@livemint.c... [488 chars]

title: South Carolina group pushes AI regulation ahead of legislative session
description: The South Carolina Small Business Chamber of Commerce is pushing for artificial intelligence regulation as the state’s legislative session approaches, setting up a potential conflict with President Donald Trump’s executive order blocking state AI oversight.

title: Emerging-Market Stock Index Hits Five-Year High on AI Bets
description: Emerging-market stocks were off to strong start in 2026, climbing to the highest in almost five years as optimism about Asia’s growing role in artificial intelligence propelled the region’s technology shares.
content:

title: US stocks rose again in 2025 despite tariff, Fed turbulence
description: NEW YORK — The year 2025 was scary good for investors. It was scary because the U.S. stock market plunged to several historic drops on worries about everything from President Donald Trump’s tariffs to interest rates to a possible bubble in artificial-intelligence technology. In the end, though, it was a good year for anyone with […]

title: Elon Musk company bot apologizes for sharing sexualized images of children
description: Grok, the chatbot of Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI, published sexualized images of children as its guardrails seem to have failed when it was prompted with vile user requests.
content:
By Nilesh Christopher, Los Angeles Times

description: Jan 2 (Reuters) - Elon Musk's xAI ‌artificial intelligence chatbot Grok said on Friday lapses in safeguards had resulted in "images ‌depicting minors in minimal clothing" on social media platform X and that improvements ‌were being made to prevent this.
